content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #275

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 69

Submitted by @cmoesel from MITRE

Chapter: Discovery
Section: Response
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

title (field in table)

Comment:
Recommend encouraging (if not requiring) a maximum length for the "title" field so UIs can be designed with some expectation of title length.

## :de: Köln May 2018 Working Group Vote

@bvdh moved the following disposition, seconded by @olbrich.

Disposition: Not Persuasive
Disposition Comment:
We do not think adding a length limit is necessary as UIs should be expected to handle arbitrary lengths

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 1
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

Closing per the _ Not Persuasive_ vote at the :de: Köln May 2018 working group meeting.
